events.message: The insured reported a rear-end collision involving their car at a busy intersection during rush hour.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details provided about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to oversee the claim and communicate with the claimant regarding next steps.
The claim was formally acknowledged, and the claimant was informed that the process would begin promptly.
The claimant was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police reports, and repair estimates.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including detailed pictures of the car damage and the police report.
An investigation was initiated to verify the claim details and assess the extent of damage to the insured vehicle.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant's vehicle sustained rear-end damage consistent with the accident report.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the estimated repair costs minus the deductible amount.
The claimant responded positively to the settlement offer and appreciated the timely communications received.
The claim was officially approved for payment based on the agreement with the claimant on the settlement amount.
Payment was issued electronically to the claimant to cover the repair expenses for the damaged vehicle.
The claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and the claimantâ€™s satisfaction with the resolution.
All documentation and case files related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
